page.title: 06Haslingden Market
page.content: {Haslingden Market}is situated at the end of the main shopping street in Haslingden. This is called{ {Deardengate.}The market is open on Tuesdays and Fridays, from 9.30 a.m. to 5p.m. on both days.The market itself is only small with 12 stalls.There are 5 food stalls selling cakes, meat, sweets, fish and greengroceries. There are also a number of non-food stalls. These sell stationery, toys, clothes and linen. There is one second-hand stall selling books, records and numerous other items. There is a gardening stall selling plants, flowers and tools. The stall-holders have one complaint. They think the market is too far from the town-centre and they do not get enough customers.They would like to move nearer the centre.
